settings.text: Shoot us a note and we’ll get back to you ASAP!

settings.question: Where does Pupsentials ship?
settings.answer: We ship across the U.S. and internationally! Every item is packaged and shipped from our studio in Austin, Texas.

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: Standard U.S. shipping is typically $6–$9, depending on the item. International shipping is calculated at checkout based on location and package weight.

settings.question: How long will it take my order to ship?
settings.answer: Because each item is custom-made, orders ship in 3–4 weeks. During holiday seasons or with multiple pets, timelines may extend to 5–6 weeks.

settings.question: Do you ship to PO boxes?
settings.answer: Yes! We can ship to PO boxes via USPS. If you prefer UPS, we recommend using a standard street address.

settings.question: How can I change my shipping address?
settings.answer: Email us at help@pupsentials.com within 24 hours of ordering. After that, we may not be able to adjust your address depending on order status.

settings.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.answer:
You can cancel your order within 24 hours for a full refund. If your artwork has already been started, we offer a refund minus a $35 artwork fee. Unfortunately, once the embroidery process begins, changes can’t be made.

Reach out to help@pupsentials.com to change or cancel orders.

settings.question: How can I check the status of my order?
settings.answer: You’ll receive an email with tracking as soon as your item ships. If it’s been more than 4 weeks, email us at help@pupsentials.com for an update — we’re happy to help.

settings.question: Why isn’t my tracking updating?
settings.answer: Sometimes tracking can take 1–2 business days to reflect movement. If your package has been in the same location for 3+ days, reach out and we’ll follow up directly with the carrier.

settings.question: How long does it take to receive my order?
settings.answer: Orders typically ship in 3–4 weeks. During peak seasons or if you have multiple pets, it may take 5–6 weeks.

settings.question: Where do you ship from?
settings.answer: Everything is checked, packaged, and shipped from our studio in Austin, TX.

settings.question: Who do you ship with?
settings.answer: We ship via UPS and USPS. Tracking is emailed to you once your order leaves our studio.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes! International orders may take 1–2 additional weeks depending on location and customs.

settings.question: What payment methods does Pupsentials accept?
settings.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay Installments. You can split your payment at checkout if desired.

settings.question: Can I cancel or get a refund?
settings.answer:
Yes — you can request a full refund within 24 hours of ordering by emailing us at help@pupsentials.com.

If your artwork hasn’t been started yet, we’ll refund you in full.

If the artwork has already been created, you’ll receive a refund minus a $35 hand-drawn artwork fee to honor our artist’s time and care.

Because every item is made just for you, we do not accept returns or exchanges after 24 hours unless something arrives damaged or incorrect.

settings.question: Can I exchange my item?
settings.answer: We do not accept exchanges due to the personalized nature of our products. Please double-check your size and color before ordering — and reach out if you’re unsure. We're happy to help you decide!

settings.question: What if my gift recipient wants to exchange or return their item?
settings.answer: We suggest giving them a Pupsentials gift card or letting them design their own item if unsure about size or style. Once embroidered, items cannot be exchanged or refunded unless damaged.

settings.question: What about limited-edition collections?
settings.answer: All limited-edition items follow our standard policies. Quantities are limited, and once sold out, we may not restock — so we recommend ordering early and double-checking all customization details.

settings.question: How do I wash my Pupsentials products?
settings.answer:
Turn your item inside out, machine wash cold, and lay flat to dry.

Do not iron directly on embroidery. Avoid bleach or high heat to preserve color and stitching.

For bags and hats, spot clean only. Do not machine wash.

settings.question: Where are your products made?
settings.answer: All our artwork is created in-house by our team of artists. Embroidery is completed by our trusted production partners, then shipped to our studio in Austin, TX for final inspection and packaging.

settings.question: Can I put more than one dog or pet on my sweatshirt?
settings.answer: Yes! We allow up to 5 pets per item — each additional pet is $15. Want more than 5? Email us at help@pupsentials.com and we’ll see if we can make it work!

settings.question: What is the size guide for your products?
settings.answer:
All apparel is unisex with a slightly oversized, relaxed fit.

We currently offer S–2XL. A full size chart is available on each product page — or reach out to our team for live help picking the right fit.

settings.question: How do I place an order?
settings.answer: Choose your product (crewneck, hoodie, tote, etc.), select your color and size, upload your pet photo(s), and checkout. Our artists take it from there.

settings.question: Can I reorder the same design later?
settings.answer:
Yes — we save every artwork file.

Use your unique artwork reorder code for $25 off (included in your original proof email), or email us at help@pupsentials.com and we’ll find it for you.

settings.question: Can I order more than one item with the same pet?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Add as many items as you’d like to your cart. We also offer discounts for bulk or gifting — reach out to us at help@pupsentials.com.

settings.question: Can I order if my pet passed away?
settings.answer:
Yes — many customers order to honor pets they’ve lost. These are incredibly meaningful, and we treat them with extra care.

Check out our custom Memorial Sweatshirt.

settings.question: What kind of photo should I upload?
settings.answer:
Clear, front-facing photos in natural light work best. Your pet’s full face and coloring should be

visible. No heavy filters or blur, please.

settings.question: Can I upload multiple pets?
settings.answer:
Yes! You can include up to 5 pets per item. Each additional pet is $15.

Want to include more than 5 pets? Reach out here and we’ll do our best to help.

settings.question: Do you do cats?
settings.answer:
Absolutely. We love all animals — dogs, cats, horses, bunnies, birds, and more.

Check out the Cat Shop and our Unique Pet shop.

settings.question: Who creates the artwork?
settings.answer: A real artist hand-draws your pet from your photo — each piece is 100% custom and truly one-of-a-kind.

settings.question: Can I add angel wings, collars, or bowties to my artwork?
settings.answer: You can leave a request in the order notes in your cart at checkout and we’ll do our best. All custom additions are at the discretion of the artist.

settings.question: Can I add sleeve text?
settings.answer: Yes — we offer custom sleeve embroidery for $10. Add your message in the order notes at checkout.

settings.question: Can I request a handwritten note for a gift?
settings.answer:
Yes! Just let us know what you'd like written in the Gift Note section at checkout.

Prices will not be shown and the entire order will ship as a gift.

settings.question: Can I make a special request?
settings.answer: Most of the time — yes! Please email help@pupsentials.com and we’ll take care of you.

settings.question: Can I request a handwritten note for a gift?
settings.answer:
Yes! Just let us know what you'd like written in the Gift Note section at checkout.

For gift orders, prices will not be visible and all items ship together.

settings.question: Need help choosing color, size, or photo?
settings.answer: We offer complimentary support to help you pick the best combo. Email our team anytime and we'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.

settings.question: Do you offer group, wedding, or corporate gifting?
settings.answer: Yes — we love working on meaningful bulk orders. Whether it’s for a wedding party, holiday gifting, or your company’s next event, we can make it special. Reach out here and we’ll help you design the perfect group experience.

settings.question: What sizes do you offer?
settings.answer:
We currently offer Small through 2XL on all items. (Kids' sizing coming soon!)

See our denim size guide here

See our crewneck size guide here

settings.question: How does the sizing run?
settings.answer: Our pieces are unisex and designed with a relaxed, cozy fit. Order your regular size, or size up for a more oversized feel.

settings.question: Still Have Questions?
settings.answer:
We’re a small, real team — and we’re here to help. Please allow 24-48 business hours for a response.

Email: help@pupsentials.com

Support Hours: Monday–Friday, 9am–5pm CST

settings.text: Our goal is for every customer to be totally satisfied with their purchase. If this isn’t the case, let us know and we’ll do our best to work with you to make it right.
We are unable to accept returns on certain items. These will be carefully marked before purchase.

settings.heading: When will I get my order?

settings.text: We will work quickly to ship your order as soon as possible. Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with further information. Delivery times vary depending on your location.
Our products are manufactured both locally and globally. We carefully select our manufacturing partners to ensure our products are high quality and a fair value.
Shipping is calculated based on your location and the items in your order. You will always know the shipping price before you purchase.
